title: [K-12] Intensive Short-Term Course on Identifying Trend Relationships Using Visual Imagery

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational mathematics concepts (sets, relations) and understanding of matrices/graphs
context.additional_context: Conducted in BYOD environments for general citizens with advanced domain expertise in science

learning_goals: Learners can visualize transitive relationships as graphs and identify them with at least 85% accuracy.
Learners can explain the error-free conversion process between matrix and graph representations.
Learners achieve at least 80% problem-solving success by applying transitive relationships to real-life science problems (e.g., ecological food chains).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
